description:
New communal staircase entrances.  Extension of conciarge entrance to Orkney House.  Demolition of existing garages and formation of new parking bays.  New security screens to ground floor access walkways. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  ARCH/L101, L102, L103, L104, L105A,                         L106 as existing.                         ARCH/L021A, L201A, L202A, L203,                         L204, L205A, L206, L217 as proposed,                         ARCH/501 and applicant's letter                         dated 31st January, 2000.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
